import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { authService } from '../../services/auth'; import { geolocationService } from '../../services/geolocation'; import './SafetyCheck.css'; const SafetyCheck = () => { const [checkingIn, setCheckingIn] = useState(false); const [lastCheckIn, setLastCheckIn] = useState(null); const [location, setLocation] = useState(null); const [safetyScore, setSafetyScore] = useState(94); const userInfo = authService.getUserInfo(); const handleSafetyCheckIn = async () => { setCheckingIn(true); try { const position = await geolocationService.getEnhancedPosition(); setLocation(position); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); setLastCheckIn(new Date()); setSafetyScore(prev => Math.min(prev + 2, 100)); toast.success('‚úÖ Safety check-in successful! Your contacts have been notified.'); } catch (error) { console.error('Check-in error:', error); toast.error('‚ùå Failed to check in. Please try again.'); } finally { setCheckingIn(false); } }; const handleQuickActions = (action) => { const actions = { location: 'üìç Location shared with emergency contacts', assistance: 'üÜò Non-emergency assistance requested', update: 'üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Status update sent to family', emergency: 'üö® Emergency services contacted!' }; const message = actions[action]; if (action === 'emergency') { toast.error(message); } else { toast.success(message); } }; return (
